request_confirmation_wait_x_s.message: Please wait %s sec before resending request.

terms_first_bullet.message: We do not collect demographic data such as age and gender.

terms_second_bullet.message: We collect anonymized app usage data and crash reports to ensure the quality of our app.

store_description.message:
The Gnosis Safe is a multi-signature Ethereum wallet providing users with a convenient, secure way to manage their digital assets and interact with the decentralized web.

You can receive, hold and transfer Ether and ERC-20 tokens with the Gnosis Safe. Via the Chrome extension you can interact with decentralized applications.

change_password_description.message: Password is used to unlock the extension and confirm transactions. Don't share this password with others!

new_password_identical_chars.message: No more than 2 identical characters in a row

new_password_number_and_letter.message: Password with at least 1 number and 1 letter

replace_recovery_phrase_explanation.message: Scan the QR code below when requested in the mobile app

connected_extension_succesfully.message:
Extension setup succesfully!
Connect with the mobile app.

connect_extension_explanation.message: Connect extension with mobile app by scanning the QR code

show_qr_code_description.message: Scan the QR code below when requested in the mobile app

confirm_transaction_state.message: This transaction has been initiated by the Gnosis Safe mobile app. When you confirm, the mobile app will submit the transaction.

confirmation_requested.message: The confirmation of a new transaction was requested

safe_connected_description.message: Your Safe is now synced to your browser extension

web3_injection_failed.message: Gnosis Safe web3 provider injection failed

provider_not_syncronous.message: SafeProvider does not support this synchronous request

options_page_title.message: Gnosis Safe - Thank you for installing!

options_page_header.message:
Thank you for installing
the Gnosis Safe browser extension!

options_page_description.message: To use the Safe extension you first need to allow notifications. They are used to notify you about transactions sent from the Gnosis Safe mobile app.

extension_store_description.message: Safely store Ether and ERC-20 tokens with 2-factor authentication.

create_password_title.message: Secure and encrypt your browser extension with a password

review_terms.message: Please review our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

confirm_with_mobile.message: Confirm this transaction with the Gnosis Safe mobile app.
